Maximally Unpredictable sequences

22 Nov 2016

Recently, my abstract algebra teacher mentioned a very interesting class of binary sequences called “maximally unpredictable” sequences, so I decided to make a simple generator. Hit Generate Sequence if you want to see the original sequence(A038219), or type in any binary sequence and this will generate the “most unpredictable” sequence based off of your input.


I first got interested in binary sequences two summers ago when I came across the Thue-Morse sequence (A010060). This sequence is defined recursively:

Here’s what that sequence looks like.

I was able to work out a (messy) closed form solution

Ehrenfeucht, A., & Mycielski, J. (1992). A Pseudorandom Sequence–How Random Is It? The American Mathematical Monthly, 99(4), 373-375. doi:10.2307/2324917
